original_text: They decided to stay there for the night. They went into the city. They sat down in the public place in the middle of the city. But no one took them in to their home to sleep for the night.
korean_text: 기브아에 가서 유숙하려고 그리로 돌아 들어가서 성읍 넓은 거리에 앉아 있으나 그를 집으로 영접하여 유숙하게 하는 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: They decided to stay there for the night.
in the public place in the middle of the city.
But no one took them in
to their home to sleep for the night.
